Articles.Content:
Yes, here we are again. You don't add something that was advertised in the trailer as simply "coming soon", and not celebrate somehow. And with all the people wanting Magic Boulder back, maybe they fixed it!

The kerbal world is vast. I'm sure somebody will find something!
So it's time for The Hunt for The Magic Boulder?

So it's time for The Hunt for The Magic Boulder?

Was it moved from it's original ike orbit? I really haven't played for a while...

Was it moved from it's original ike orbit? I really haven't played for a while...

It was accidentally removed, and people keep searching for it to see if it is back. Squad never says a thing.
The best Easter Egg thread used to be http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551-Spoiler-Easter-Egg-Stocktake-0-23-5-%28Done%21%29-Pic-Heavy - don't know if that'll be updated.

The best Easter Egg thread used to be http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551-Spoiler-Easter-Egg-Stocktake-0-23-5-%28Done%21%29-Pic-Heavy - don't know if that'll be updated.

It will be updated. But it is actually more like a collection. I leave the easter egg hunt to you guys

It was accidentally removed, and people keep searching for it to see if it is back. Squad never says a thing.

The code should still exist. If we can find it's code someone could probably re-add it.

Edited July 19, 2014 by mike9606
There should also be an expedition to some of the borked-out existing easter eggs, like the [spoilerS AHEAD] buried rover cam on Duna, the Duna SSTV signal, underground monoliths, etc.
